document.full_text: seven state workers who won the $319 million mega millions lottery said on thursday they're still deciding whether to split it with five unlucky co-workers who chose not to play this time around.
document.title: seven new york state workers win $319 million lottery
lines_and_colors: seven state workers who won the $319 million mega millions lottery said on thursday they're still deciding whether to split it with five unlucky co-workers who chose not to play this time around.
